response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by its creators. Considering its quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than what you've assessed. However, I understand value perceptions vary. To make this deal attractive for both of us, I propose a price of $140. This allows you to acquire a high-quality item at a slightly above-market rate, while ensuring I receive a fair compensation for my efforts in bringing this opportunity to you. Let me know if this proposal suits your budget and preferences.", "product_price": 140}
